taskDescription:
Compute <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mfrac>
    <mn>3</mn>
    <mn>10</mn>
  </mfrac>
  <mo>รท<!-- รท --></mo>
  <mfrac>
    <mn>12</mn>
    <mn>25</mn>
  </mfrac>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\frac{3}{10} \div \frac{12}{25}</annotation></semantics></math> and reduce to lowest terms.
